title: Azzaro Solarissimo Marettimo
text:
by: Sanja Pekic Azzaro Solarissimo collection finds the inspiration in the heart of the Mediterranean, the combination of sun and sea, and represents an invitation for getaways. After Solarissimo Levanzo from 2016, the house of Azzaro launches Solarissimo Marettimo in April 2017, a fragrance that represents the first rays of the sun on the surface of the Mediterranean Sea. Solarissimo Marettimo is a fresh Eau de Toilette, with accords of citrusy fruits, aquatic notes and woods, evoking the sunny open sea. Crisp lemon opens the composition and leads to the heart of the aquatic molecule Calypsone. The base leaves a woody trail of cedar. 
The fragrance comes in a blue bottle of the identical design as its precursor, as a 75 ml Eau de Toilette . 
Sanja Pekić
